text: je divase tamane saune te bhega thavana divase bhega karase, te ja a divasa che hara-jitano. Ane je vyakti allaha para imana lavi sadakaryo kare allaha tenathi teni bura'i'o dura kari dese. Ane tene jannatomam dakhala karase, jeni nice nahero vahi rahi che, jemam te'o hammesa hammesa rahese, a ja bhavya saphalata che
